scripts.deploy: git branch gh-pages && git checkout gh-pages && git merge main --no-edit && git add dist -f && git commit -m "Deployment commit" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && git checkout main
scripts.start-up: npm install -D webpack webpack-cli && npx webpack && npm install -D html-webpack-plugin && npx webpack && npm install -D style-loader css-loader && npx webpack && npm install -D html-loader && npx webpack && npm install -D webpack-dev-server && npx webpack
scripts.prettier-setup:
npm i -D --save-exact prettier && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.prettierrc','{}
')" && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.prettierignore','# Ignore artifacts:
build
coverage
')" && npx webpack
